dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of handwritten digits used for training machine learning models, particularly in the context of federated learning with non-IID data.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hao Wang
Zakhary Kaplan
Di Niu
Baochun Li
dcterms:description: A modified version of the MNIST dataset where the data is distributed in a non-IID manner across multiple nodes, simulating real-world scenarios in federated learning.
dcterms:title: Non-IID MNIST Datasets
